title: I got an S in a ranked game but did not get a mastery token

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: As the title says, I finished a ranked game and got an S but did not get a token. I re-logged and checked my loot but it still wasn't there. Something similar happened when I got an S- in a normal game and did not get a chest. Please enlighten me on my situation {{summoner:13}}

replies.body: Okie dokie guys, I've been told if you submit a support ticket about the issue I believe they can compensate you, it was a known issue and has since been fixed. I will warn you now though that they won't be able to give you the actual tokens, for much the same reason they can't compensate with LP when that messes up.

i also submitted a bug report for this issue as i received 2 S' in consecutive games received no chest or mastery token.
also in match history the rank of my play does not show up next to the exp as it does in earlier games.
Sorry for the late reply, I'll see what I can dig up for you, not sure if this is a known/isolated issue.
I just went S- with Janna in a bloody difficult ranked game and I didn't receive a 6 token either. I only need one more for level 6 mastery. What's going on here?

Same with me I currently have level 5 mastery on ezreal, and gotten multiple S's and no mastery token in ranked. However I got an S on lee in a normal and got a token. So I'm wondering if this is a ranked bug?

I'm having the same problem. I've earnt Ss on my past few ranked games, however, have received no mastery tokens. I've also found that a few of my grades don't show up in my match history. Some help would be much appreciated! :)
